title: rAvE parvata rAjakumArI
sahitya:
rAvE parvata rAjakumArI dEvI nannu brOcuTaku vEvEgamE


anupallavi

  nIvE gatiyani nammiyuNTi gAdA nA moraliDagA jeppavammA mA talli


caraNam 1    dhIra kumAra vanditapadA nIradavENi trilOka janani nIvugadA 
nAradAdinuta shubha caritA udAra guNavatI padAbjamulE sharaNaNTi
    caraNam 2    mInalOcanI krpajUDavammA dInarakSakiyani birudu nIku tagu 
dAnava ripu tOSiNi purANi abhaya dAnamiyyavE shyAmakrSNa sOdari
